column1: Duilin was an Elf-lord of Gondolin
column2: chief of the House of the Swallow
column3: as is stated in the Fall of Gondolin.  He was a master archer
column4: as well as the "swiftest of all men to run and leap".  He perished during the Fall upon the walls even as he shot
column5: smitten by a fiery bolt of the Balrogs.

column2: swallow" in Gnomish; its Qenya form is Tuilindo.
